snippet: The judge rejected the argument by the Fargo, N.D., man’s lawyer that the ice-resurfacing machine did not meet the definition of a vehicle under city code.
abstract: Steven James Anderson of Fargo, ND, is convicted for driving zamboni during high school hockey game while drunk.
lead_paragraph: The judge rejected the argument by the Fargo, N.D., man’s lawyer that the ice-resurfacing machine did not meet the definition of a vehicle under city code.

headline.main: Drunk While Operating Zamboni, Man Is Convicted
